seo.title: Return-to-work & clarity coaching
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for carers, parents, and professionals rebuilding momentum after a career pause.

hero.title: Re-enter work with clarity that honours care and capacity.
hero.summary: We create room to name competing commitments, renegotiate support, and experiment with rhythms that fit your life now.

isForYou.title: Is this for you?
items: You are returning to paid work after caregiving, illness, or relocation.
You want to align family agreements, personal energy, and professional goals.
You feel pressure to “catch up” yet want to move with care for yourself and others.
You are navigating part-time, flexible, or portfolio work and crave clarity.

explore.title: What we explore together
items: What does “enough” look like for you and the people who rely on you?
Which boundaries need to be set, strengthened, or softened?
What stories about productivity or loyalty are ready to be updated?
How might you ask for support without feeling you must over-explain?
What experiments could help you test new routines or responsibilities safely?
Where do you want to feel more confident saying yes, no, or not yet?

format.title: Format & flow
bullets: Recommend four to six 60-minute sessions across two to three months, with optional pauses during school holidays or care peaks.
We track energy, agreements, and learning using simple check-ins you approve.
You stay in charge of homework—small experiments only happen with your consent.
We conclude with a review of supports, celebration of learning, and options for future touchpoints.

items.context: A parent rejoining the workforce after parental leave felt torn between career stretch projects and caring for an elder.
items.approach: We mapped caregiving capacity, practised conversations with their manager about workload, and co-designed weekly reflection prompts shared with their partner.
items.outcome: They felt clearer about boundaries, secured flexible arrangements, and kept agency over professional growth.

not.title: What this is not
items: Not career counselling or CV rewriting—we focus on decision-making and agency.
Not a guarantee of promotion or employment offers.
Not therapy or childcare advice—we collaborate with you to notice patterns and choose next steps.

cta.body: If this sounds close to your reality, you’re welcome to book a 20-minute chat.
